about_the_game:
Travel through this exotic Greek-like world as Lira, a bounty hunter cursed with Necrolepsy, in this middle-of-the-game demo, giving you all the fun things to learn about Necrolepsy.

Explore a Giant Level!
Finding your way through will be crazy! Explore a chunk of a large level as you're made familiar with the gameplay and find hidden items throughout!

Watch the Timer!
The main theme of Necrolepsy is the timer ticking down. When it reaches 0, Lira ends up in a nightmare world as part of her curse! Fight through bigger baddies to reach the end!

Practice and Perform Unique Combos!
You can do unique combos from the variety of weapons you have at your disposal. Not only that, but the game has a unique juggle system so that you can keep your enemies at bay as you wail on them!

name: Necrolepsy Demo
short_description: Bounty hunting ain't easy! In this slice-of-pie piece, check out Lira's journey in a demo world where you get a nice taste of the full game of Necrolepsy!
